p: Terpenes and terpenoids are highly concentrated in the essential oils extracted from the cannabis plant, and are also responsible for the therapeutic benefits that essential oils provide. A study by Piccaglia et al., 2016 explored the biological properties of some terpenes making up said essential oils extracted from the cannabis plant ( Table 3) by distillation and characterized by gas chromatography–mass spectrometry (GC–MS). Table 3 also shows the biological properties of other common terpenes found in cannabis.
